creating a configuration profile for configuring a  apparatus of the motor  on a  in order to transmit the selected  transmitting the created configuration profile from the  to the  apparatus configuring the  apparatus on the basis of the configuration profile in order to read in the selected  reading in the selected This method can be carried out using the telematics system explained above This embodiment is explained on the basis of an insurance contract which is concluded between an insurance company and the owner of the motor  and the insurance premiums of which need to be adapted or calculated The method begins in step S In step S a motor  and  to be transmitted from the latter are selected on the operating computer The selection of the  presupposes a previous login of the user of the operating computer on the  with successful authentication and identification of the corresponding motor  In this case a  identification designator for example a  identification  or a chassis  can be input for the motor  The data which have been input are transmitted to the  and can be stored in the storage device for subsequent use On the basis of the  identification designator the  can determine the  type and communication connection data for communicating with the motor  from the motor  database stored in the storage device radio device The  controls the display of the operating computer in such a manner that only  whose  values are accordingly available in the motor  or can be determined from  values available in the motor  are offered for selection For example speed data and location data relating to the motor  are displayed on the operating computer as  which can be selected if the  type of the motor  has a data bus with a tachometer and a navigation system connected.
